name: CELL HOP
description:
Hop to your hearts content and see how many points you can get in this retro inspired game. *Warning* this game may induce rage and is subject to updates in the future. (This is the first game I have ever created for a game jam. It's also my first official release, so please go easy on me I had like 3 days to make it.)

The Application Is a file named The Ball Game 2D.

(Just wasn't sure what I was going to call it, when I first started. Sorry if that confuses things, but the Zip file contains all the required data now and everything works as expected now.)
